harmony.physicalContactObject: black and silver telescoping selfie stick with phone clamp

harmony.explanation: The iMac’s wide, rigid aluminum base offers an easy‐to‐hit, stationary target roughly the size of the virtual watermelon. With the selfie-stick extended halfway, the user can reliably make contact every time visual penetration occurs, so haptic timing should stay well aligned.
